channel.title: the greats on The Chief's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in the greats on The Chief's Blog

item.title: Adam Robinson on The Business Brew
item.description: Notes from an awesome podcast episode of The Busines Brew, featuring Adam Robinson. This one was not easy to digest, as Adam touches on A LOT of topics.

item.title: Joe Moglia
item.description: Disclaimer: I am a shareholder of $OPFI. That’s how I first heard of coach Joe Moglia.

item.title: Glenn Stearns
item.description: This is a summary of a truly fantastic episode of the “Grit Happens” podcast, featuring Glenn Stearns, founder and CEO of Kind Lending.
